message: But it does not offer much
Site24x7.com has been OK but it's really expensive.
wasitup.com looks great! Registered a couple of sites already. It was sooo easy
@madewulf not offering much is not a problem. Might be cheaper! It's for personal stuff so cheap is good.
Pingdom is ok, though their network sometimes seems to give me false positive.. but one server is free.
CORRECTION: Site24x7 is $1 per month per URL every 60 MINUTES. For every 1 min it's $12/month/URL
@peterbe Glad you liked wasitup. I only have good things to say about this service. The only missing feature for me would be a sms option for my most important sites.
I've tried several and recommend Pingdom. Also when researching I came across an article that compared the notification speed during outages and Pingdom was the fastest.

We've got a really nice website & server monitoring service over at sentinelmonitoring.com. It's $10/month to monitor as many services as you like over 3 IP addresses every 5 minutes. Also has a month risk free trial so give it  go. I'd love to get your feedback - Mark
Thanks for the tip @mark0s! I will check it out
